subject: RE: Urgent: MR website updates
preview: Hi Janina,  We have added these in a tabbed section to allow for the varying length of copy for each doctor. I think it's a good solution, let me know what you think? Thanks,  Heath Maguire CREATIVE D

full_threads.body:
Hi Janina,

We have added these in a tabbed section to allow for the varying length of copy for each doctor. I think it's a good solution, let me know what you think? Thanks,

Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

Hi Heath,

I spoke with Trudy on this one and we ideally want to keep the copy as is as this has already been approved by the doctors.

If possible, maybe you can do an image flip? Would that help? I am referring to having the headshots featured and when you hover over it, the copy appears. We also do like the format of a slider as well.

We are open to other web layout ideas, just without being able to shorten the content.

We would also like to have this somehow featured on the medicine page as well:

https://metrorehab2021.wpperk.cloud/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/medicine/

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Thanks so much,

Janina

JANINA HIPOLITO​

MARKETING SPECIALIST

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St

Milsons Point

NSW

2061

D.

02 9808 9373

M.

0435 325 077

E.

Janina.Hipolito@royalrehab.com.au









I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Janina, 

Copy edit refers to editing the copy of the bios, so they are shorter in length. 

We can't actually have a read more link in those sliders (it's a technical limitation as they are built to be able scroll with your finger on mobile). 

Let me know what you think?

Hey Heath,

Can you clarify what you mean by copy edit?

Another option is if I cut down the copy, and then have a "Read more…" at the end that directs to that landing page. Would this work?

Also, TM mentioned that on the Medicine homepage, we will need to highlight the doctors there as well as Our People. Is there anyway to do this without duplicating the content?

Many thanks,

Janina

JANINA HIPOLITO​

MARKETING SPECIALIST

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St

Milsons Point

NSW

2061

D.

02 9808 9373

M.

0435 325 077

E.

Janina.Hipolito@royalrehab.com.au









I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Janina, 

Ok noted thank you. Their bios however are quite long and won't work well in the slider format. 

You could copyedit the bios or we could present them in an accordion of some sort?

Hi Heath,

Just wanted to check in regarding the "Rehabilitation Specialists". It is going to a separate landing page, however we would like it on the below page:

https://metrorehab2021.wpperk.cloud/about-us/our-people/

We would it to sit above "Our Rehabilitation Care Coordinators" and appear in a slider format similar to the below.

Any questions - let me know!

Janina Hipolito

JANINA HIPOLITO​

Thanks Heath.

I will keep you updated on any further changes but should be relatively minor from here on 😊

Many thanks,

Janina

Hi Janina, 

Confirming these recent changes have now been made also.

@heath done adding nursing and medicine under health disciplines. nav menu already updated

please check and let me know if I miss something on the task. thank you

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Jaime Velasquez
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thanks for the update!

I have some additional feedback:
Under "Conditions We Treat" on the menu bar please update heading "Pain Issues" to "Pain Management"
Add "Nursing" page under "Health Disciplines". Can be blank as I will fill in copy and imagery.
Add "Medicine" page under "Health Disciplines". Can be blank as I will fill in copy and imagery.
In the menu bar, under "Health Disciplines", "Medicine" should appear at the top followed by "Nursing" then the rest as is.

Please note, we are yet to have final sign off from CEO/ exec team so may have a few additional changes. I’m trying to compile rather than send through bit by bit, however need the above actioned for me to add copy.

What’s TBC:
A few additional staff to be featured on Our People – JH to chase and follow up and provide Heath w copy and headshots if available.
Headshots of doctors
Additional condition pages have been requested – JH to follow up with team on what conditions and will request new pages soon.

Any questions, let me know.

Thanks so much,
Janina


JANINA HIPOLITO​

I have some urgent feedback from our exec team that we would ideally like completed by 1pm tomorrow. We are regrouping again tomorrow with them so it would be great to show what we have updated.

Please see attached word document. I have also attached the relevant files as per the document.

Headshots of doctors (we don’t have all at this stage so TBC the rest):
https://we.tl/t-m2D9yyn4Zs <https://we.tl/t-m2D9yyn4Zs>

Any questions, let me know and happy to have a chat over the phone if need be just give me a buzz.

Many thanks,
Janina
